data.message: Happy Valentines Day! How do I get a status on a case I have reported? You have not started processing it yet.

replies.message: Hello Mia. If you've reported something for violating the Facebook Terms, you may have the option to check the status of your report from the Support Dashboard. Visit our Help Center to learn more: http://bit.ly/2kYIAFU. -Zack
Why don't you respond to my comment?
Stop disabling innocent people account Facebook!

Facebook Thanks, but I did not report and issue regarding violated terms. I need some help with my business account at work and I have waited for the case to processed for a month now... It is getting harder and harder to do my job. How long before my case is processed?
